abstract: Essex County, NJ, grand jury indicts Ali Muhammad Brown on nine counts, including state-level terrorism charges, in connection with 2014 murder of Brendan Tevlin in West Orange; is first case in New Jersey in which prosecutors have brought terrorism charges against defendant in murder case.
lead_paragraph: Ali Muhammad Brown, 30, is accused of killing Brendan Tevlin, 19, as an act of “revenge” for United States military action overseas.

headline.main: Man Accused in Killing Is Indicted on Terrorism Charges, a First for New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Man Is Indicted on State-Level Terror Charges in Killing

snippet: Ali Muhammad Brown, 30, is accused of killing Brendan Tevlin, 19, as an act of “revenge” for United States military action overseas.
